title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin dissects the biggest moves in the NBA over the past several years and reveals the downside to player mobility. He points out the one team outside of the Warriors Kevin Durant would be a great fit on. He shares his top 10 quarterbacks in the NFL right now with a few surprising names not making the cut. Plus, filmmaker Gotham Chopra joins the show to give some insight on his latest film involving 4 time NBA champion Draymond Green. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
